video_prompt: A humanoid tiger strides confidently down a vibrant runway, its tailored outfit subtly shifting with each step. Accessories glint as its head subtly turns, acknowledging an unseen audience. The surrounding fashion show environment blurs as it progresses, lights subtly changing.
image_prompt: Generate an image of a white tiger, digitally edited to resemble a human at a fashion show. The tiger, centered in a full-body, eye-level, slightly-rotated shot, wears a pink gradient jacket, white button-up shirt, and Louis Vuitton monogrammed white pants. Accessories include pink sunglasses, a ring on its right hand, and a small earring on its right ear. The tiger stands on a pink runway, with a blurred fashion show audience in the background. The lighting is soft, diffused, and dominated by white and pink hues, creating a serene and sophisticated atmosphere. Do not include the text "C29".
refined_video_prompt: A humanoid tiger strides confidently, its tailored outfit subtly shifting and rippling with each step. Accessories glint as its head subtly turns, acknowledging an unseen presence. The surrounding fashion show environment dynamically blurs and alters, with lights subtly changing patterns as it progresses.
